description: Defines the Note data class as an entity for Room database, representing a user note with attributes such as title, content, category, timestamps, and primary key.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class for storing user notes in the Room database with fields for ID, title, content, category, creation, and update timestamps.

methods.name: <init>
methods.description: Constructor for creating a new Note instance with default ID and current timestamps for createdAt and updatedAt.
